text: Alstone Church Alstone is a hamlet in the civil parish of Teddington in the English county of Gloucestershire, situated between the towns of Tewkesbury and Winchcombe. Until 1844 Alstone was part of an exclave of the county of Worcestershire. ==External links== * Category:Villages in Gloucestershire Category:Borough of Tewkesbury
title: Alstone, Tewkesbury
